title: Search strings in multiple files/processes/modules (x64dbg)
content:
when you click 
String references
in x64dbg, it only lists strings from current module/file. Is that possible to search strings in multiple (selected) files/modules?

answers_data.content:
From what I know you can search for 
String references
in all modules. The way is: right click ---> search for ---> all modules ---> String references
